amendatorysection.catchline: Instruments; endorsement, recording, and indexing; required information.
amendatorysection.para: (1) The register of deeds shall endorse upon every instrument properly filed in his or her office for recording the minute, hour, day, month, and year when it was so filed and shall forthwith enter the same in the proper indices provided for in sections 23-1508 to 23-1517.02.
(2) Every instrument presented for recording shall have, on the first page below the three-inch margin prescribed in section 23-1503.01, the following information:
(3) After the instrument has been recorded, the book and page or computer system reference where it may be found shall be endorsed thereon.

annotation.para: Certificate of filing of instrument for record is sufficient prima facie proof that document was so filed. Smith Bros. v. Woodward, 94 Neb. 298, 143 N.W. 196 (1913).
